item.title: How I built this blog
item.description: haha hihi # more huhu library(blogdown) shortcode_html("test", content="<!--more-->") This is a simple Test Material Used : https://tclavelle.github.io/blog/blogdown_github/ https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/github-pages.html https://talesofr.wordpress.com/2017/08/18/starting-a-rmarkdown-blog-with-bookdown-hugo-github/ https://yihui.name/en/2017/08/hugo-post-summary/#fnref:I-broke-the-4th How to create 2 repo username/source username/username.github.io clone repo on computer and remove readme files start new R project project option -> website, select source as base directory load necessary libraries # Load blogdown package and install Hugo library(blogdown) install_hugo() choose a theme set “source” as working directory create site # Create new site in our recently cloned blogdown repository new_site(theme = "kakawait/hugo-tranquilpeak-theme", format = 'toml') add folowing lines in config.
